successes.title: King Down
successes.description:
Blood. Greed. Glory. Honor.
A game of Kings, featuring miniatures, spells and the ultimate battle for the throne.

Pledges.description: IN HIS MAJESTY'S SERVICE. Pledge your allegiance to the rightful heir.

BEND THE KNEE - 4 decks of King Down cards (Fire, Ice, Earth, Sky), playable w/ any chess set - contains all 80 original characters + spells cards & 20 'Keepers of the King' expansions cards + ALL unlocked Stretch Goal cards! (FREE WORLDWIDE SHIPPING)

KING SIZE (early bird) - THE FULL GAME - Contains 40 original King Down minis + 80 original character and spell cards + ‘KEEPERS OF THE KING’ free expansion - Contains 20 new minis + 20 new character cards + KS EXCLUSIVE ‘prison cells’ and ‘base camps’ + ALL Stretch Goals. (FREE WORLDWIDE SHIPPING)

KING SIZE - THE FULL GAME - Contains 40 original King Down minis + 80 original character and spell cards + ‘KEEPERS OF THE KING’ free expansion - Contains 20 new minis + 20 new character cards + KS EXCLUSIVE ‘prison cells’ and ‘base camps’ + ALL Stretch Goals. (FREE WORLDWIDE SHIPPING)
SAAR SHAI SPECIAL - King Size + The Agents (my previous secret-agent themed tactical card game 2-5 players.) (FREE WORLDWIDE SHIPPING)
LONG LIVE THE KINGS - Everything in KING SIZE tier + Shadow & Spirit expansion + Chess booster for all 4 original armies. (FREE WORLDWIDE SHIPPING)
DOUBLE KING SIZE - Two sets of the King Size bundle (2 x Stretch Goals.) (FREE WORLDWIDE SHIPPING)
GREED & GLORY - Everything in LONG LIVE THE KINGS tier + 2 BIG pre-painted figurines. (FREE WORLDWIDE SHIPPING)

SWORD IN THE STONE - EXCLUSIVE COLLECTOR'S EDITION of the King Size tier, includes all 60+ miniatures made out of POLYSTONE RESIN.
(FREE US/CA/EU EXPEDITED SHIPPING!)
THE ARMORY (Group Rate) - 6 x King Size tier (w/ Stretch Goals and exclusives). (FREE US/CA/EU EXPEDITED SHIPPING!)
*PAINTED* SWORD IN THE STONE - EXCLUSIVE COLLECTOR'S EDITION of the King Size tier, includes all 60+ miniatures made out of POLYSTONE RESIN and PRE-PAINTED. (FREE US/CA/EU EXPEDITED SHIPPING!)
